value.title: StarCraft 2 - Do Zerg B2GM builds work in Grandmaster? (Bronze to GM #11)
value.excerpt: Bronze or Silver Zerg builds shouldn't work in GM right?! WRONG! I made them work in Grandmaster against opponents I normally struggle with.
